alert.note: Alert for Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued February 24 at 2:59AM PST until February 24 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 23. For the second Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 23 expected again. * WHERE...South Central Oregon Coast and Curry County Coast. This includes all southern Oregon coastal cities this morning, then all with the exception of near the beaches in Curry County on Saturday morning. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, until 9 AM PST this morning. For the second Freeze Warning, from 1 AM to 9 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast
